snippet: The safety feature will be standard in all Buick Enclaves as well as in GMC Acadia and Chevrolet Traverse models with power seats.
abstract: The safety feature will be standard in all Buick Enclaves as well as in GMC Acadia and Chevrolet Traverse models with power seats.
lead_paragraph: General Motors showed a mildly refreshed GMC Acadia crossover at the Chicago auto show on Wednesday that nevertheless included what G.M. described as a first for the industry.

headline.main: Front-Center Air Bags Make Debut in General Motors Crossovers
